title: ScribbleTaku
text:
The last scribble was indeed Spyro 2, featuring the adorable Bruno the hippo. Ektoplasm got the game first, so nice work!

Today's scribble, as you can guess, was drawn by me. There's a reason why it's especially bad, but I'll explain after the jump.

So I drew today's scribble using a stylus that came with a new Windows laptop. I'll have more to say about the laptop in due course, but as you can see, the Paint 3D experience on Windows can't hold a candle to the iPad/Procreate combo.

Anyway, good luck with the game! You definitely all know it by heart, or at least the franchise.
